title: New: Broderick Batts – Pink Empty Promises
content:
Been addicted to this new track from Tampa’s Broderick Batts recently – reminds me of the best moments of Vic Mensa and Chance merged together.

Tight verses, an energetic chorus and so so much ambition – assuring Batts’ place as one of the finest up and coming rappers around. Check out Pink Empty Promises below.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
